name: urbanriskmap-cards
description: Client input reporting cards for crowd sourcing disaster information
author: Mayank Ojha, MIT Urban Risk Lab

scripts.start: dep=au npm run pre-build-tasks && ng serve
scripts.start-ph: dep=ph npm run pre-build-tasks && ng serve
scripts.serve-prod: dep=au npm run pre-build-tasks && ng serve --prod
scripts.add-deck: ng g m routes/decks/$deck --routing && ng g c routes/decks/$deck -m $deck && babel tasks/project/add-deck/*.ts -o tasks/project/index.js && gulp -f tasks/project --deck $deck
scripts.add-card: ng g m routes/cards/$card --routing && ng g c routes/cards/$card -m $card && babel tasks/project/add-card/*.ts -o tasks/project/index.js && gulp -f tasks/project --card $card
scripts.build: npm run build-dev && npm run build-prod
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-dev-id && npm run build-dev-au
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-prod-id && npm run build-prod-ngsw-au
scripts.build-dev-jp: dep=jp npm run pre-build-tasks && ng build --configuration=dev-jp --output-path='dist/dev-jp'
scripts.build-prod-jp: dep=jp npm run pre-build-tasks && ng build --prod --configuration=prod-jp --output-path='dist/prod-jp' --build-optimizer --vendor-chunk=true --stats-json
scripts.build-dev-id: dep=id npm run pre-build-tasks && ng build --configuration=dev-id --output-path='dist/dev-id'
scripts.build-prod-id: dep=id npm run pre-build-tasks && ng build --prod --configuration=prod-id --output-path='dist/prod-id' --build-optimizer --vendor-chunk=true --stats-json
scripts.build-dev-au: dep=au npm run pre-build-tasks && ng build --configuration=dev-au --output-path='dist/dev-au'
scripts.build-prod-au: dep=au npm run pre-build-tasks && ng build --prod --configuration=prod-au --output-path='dist/prod-au' --build-optimizer --vendor-chunk=true --stats-json
scripts.build-prod-ngsw-au: npm run build-prod-au && node_modules/.bin/ngsw-config dist/prod-au ./src/ngsw-config.json && cp node_modules/@angular/service-worker/ngsw-worker.js ./dist/prod-au/ngsw-worker.js
